Description: uplink with full message contains positive longitude and latitude, 3D fixed status and period mode report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 2,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: '3D fixed',
  reportType: 2,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Periodic mode report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 24.996633,
  latitudeTxt: '24.996633',
  longitude: 121.487752,
  longitudeTxt: '121.487752',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [121.487752,24.996633] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains negative longitude, 2D fixed status and period mode report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 1,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: '2D fixed',
  reportType: 2,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Periodic mode report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and periodic mode report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 2,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Periodic mode report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, unknown status and periodic mode report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 3,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'unknown status',
  reportType: 2,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Periodic mode report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and motion static mode report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 4,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Motion mode static report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and motion moving mode report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 5,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Motion mode moving report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and motion static to moving mode report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 6,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Motion mode static to moving report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and motion moving to static mode report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 7,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Motion mode moving to static report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and help report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 14,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Help report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and low battery alarm report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 15,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Low battery alarm report',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and power on (temperature) report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 17,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Power on (temperature)',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and power off (low battery) report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 19,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Power off (low battery)',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and power off (temperature) report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 20,
  reportTypeTxt: 'Power off (temperature)',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink with full message contains gps information, not fixed status and unknown status report
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: true,
  deviceType: 0,
  deviceTypeTxt: 'LS100',
  gpsFixStatus: 0,
  gpsFixStatusTxt: 'Not fix',
  reportType: 21,
  reportTypeTxt: 'unknown report type',
  batteryCapacity: 91,
  latitude: 47.767039999999994,
  latitudeTxt: '47.767039999999994',
  longitude: -3.342727,
  longitudeTxt: '-3.342727',
  gpsAvailable: true
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 91 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [-3.342727,47.767039999999994] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: uplink when the length of payload is wrong then decoder is not available
INPUT
{
  message: {
  decoderAvailable: false
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  
}
